analysis.description:
Factory.migratePresaleBalances has external calls inside a loop:
	- icoContract.balanceOf(buyer) > 0 (/unique_chucks/29/0x55abdc2c1aeb61b06958740484e61126e273aa61.sol#423-426)

Factory.migratePresaleBalances has external calls inside a loop:
	- balance = presaleContract.balanceOf(buyer) (/unique_chucks/29/0x55abdc2c1aeb61b06958740484e61126e273aa61.sol#426)

Factory.migratePresaleBalances has external calls inside a loop:
	- icoContract.manuallyAssignTokens(buyer,balance) (/unique_chucks/29/0x55abdc2c1aeb61b06958740484e61126e273aa61.sol#427-428)

ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/29/0x55abdc2c1aeb61b06958740484e61126e273aa61.sol#108)
SomaIco.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/29/0x55abdc2c1aeb61b06958740484e61126e273aa61.sol#433)
SomaIco.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/29/0x55abdc2c1aeb61b06958740484e61126e273aa61.sol#430-431)
SomaIco.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/29/0x55abdc2c1aeb61b06958740484e61126e273aa61.sol#431-433)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/29/0x55abdc2c1aeb61b06958740484e61126e273aa61.sol:
